thrust: Pick one micro-task. Set 3 minutes. Start now.
momentum: Make the path tiny. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
ignition: Move for one minute. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Return to the next rep. Return once.
Do one more. Add one more rep. Keep it small.
Close gently. Schedule the next window. Mark next time.
Why: Small starts reduce friction and build drive.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

momentum: Do a 30-second push. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.

Do one more. Chain a second minute. Keep it small.
Close gently. Close with a simple note. Mark next time.
Why: Thrust starts the engine; repetition keeps it.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

ignition: Select one starting point. Set 5 minutes. Start now.
thrust: Set a short timer. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
momentum: Do one clean rep. Stay for 60 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Check posture and unclench. Return once.
Do one more. Keep the momentum rolling. Keep it small.
Close gently. Write the next step. Mark next time.
Why: Thrust starts the engine; repetition keeps it.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

thrust: Do a 30-second push. Stay for 5 minutes. Stop at timer.

Do one more. Chain a second minute. Keep it small.
Close gently. Close with a simple note. Mark next time.
Why: Ignition breaks freeze; momentum carries you.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

momentum: Name the first move. Set 2 minutes. Start now.
ignition: Clear one obstacle. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
thrust: Take three fast actions. Stay for 5 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Pause and mark progress. Return once.
Do one more. Increase by one notch. Keep it small.
Close gently. Send one message. Mark next time.
Why: Ignition breaks freeze; momentum carries you.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

rituals.name: Thrust Start — TS-08378
rituals.plain:
ignition: Choose one smallest step. Set 3 minutes. Start now.
thrust: Open the workspace. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
momentum: Do a 30-second push. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Breathe once and reset. Return once.
Do one more. Chain a second minute. Keep it small.
Close gently. Close with a simple note. Mark next time.
Why: Thrust starts the engine; repetition keeps it.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

rituals.name: Launch Loop — TS-08385
rituals.plain:
momentum: Pick one micro-task. Set 3 minutes. Start now.
ignition: Make the path tiny. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
thrust: Move for one minute. Stay for 30 seconds. Stop at timer.
Check body. Return to the next rep. Return once.
Do one more. Add one more rep. Keep it small.
Close gently. Schedule the next window. Mark next time.
Why: Ignition breaks freeze; momentum carries you.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.

rituals.name: Launch Loop — TS-08392
rituals.plain:
ignition: Pick one micro-task. Set 30 seconds. Start now.
thrust: Make the path tiny. Make it easy. Remove one blocker.
momentum: Move for one minute. Stay for 2 minutes. Stop at timer.
Check body. Return to the next rep. Return once.
Do one more. Add one more rep. Keep it small.
Close gently. Schedule the next window. Mark next time.
Why: Thrust starts the engine; repetition keeps it.
rituals.safety: If this feels too intense, stop and return to a neutral task.
